org.obrel.core

Interface FluentRelatable<T extends FluentRelatable<T>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.property.Fluent<T>, Relatable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RelationBuilder<R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Params

    public interface FluentRelatable<T extends FluentRelatable<T>>
extends Relatable, de.esoco.lib.property.Fluent<T>
    An interface that can be implemented by relatable objects that provide a fluent interface. The default method with(RelationType, Object) sets a relation type and then returns the current instance so that the next method can be invoked immediately (and with the corresponding syntax fluently).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default T with(RelationType<java.lang.Boolean> rType)
      Sets a flag relation type and returns this instance.
      default T with(RelationType<java.lang.Integer> rType, int nValue)
      Sets an integer relation type from an int value and returns this instance.
      default <V> T with(RelationType<V> rType, V rValue)
      Sets a relation type and returns this instance for fluent invocation of additional methods.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.obrel.core.Relatable

      • with

        default <V> T with(RelationType<V> rType,
                   V rValue)
        Sets a relation type and returns this instance for fluent invocation of additional methods. Although this method can be invoked directly it is recommended that implementing classes call this method from methods with names that provide a more concise fluent syntax.
        Parameters:
        rType - The relation type
        rValue - The value
        Returns:
        This instance for fluent invocation
